analysis.test_coverage: Unit, integration, and E2E tests present
analysis.current_status: Working browser automation with vault integration, needs UI and flow expansion

milestones.name: Vault Integration & Security
milestones.description: Complete shared_services vault integration for credential management

tasks.title: Complete vault_client.py integration
tasks.description: Finish vault client implementation for secure credential storage/retrieval
tasks.technical_notes: Depends on shared_services vault API being operational

tasks.title: Migrate hardcoded credentials to vault
tasks.description: Move all library, iClassPro, and Canvas credentials to vault storage

tasks.title: Implement credential encryption at rest
tasks.description: Add encryption layer for stored credentials in automation_data.json

tasks.title: Add credential rotation support
tasks.description: Implement automatic credential refresh and rotation mechanisms

milestones.name: Web Application Development
milestones.description: Build comprehensive web UI for automation management

tasks.title: Build dashboard UI for automation status
tasks.description: Create main dashboard showing running automations, schedules, and history

tasks.title: Add flow configuration interface
tasks.description: Build UI for creating and editing automation flows without code
dependencies: Build dashboard UI for automation status

tasks.title: Implement real-time execution monitoring
tasks.description: Add WebSocket-based live updates for automation execution

tasks.title: Create scheduler management UI
tasks.description: Build interface for managing cron schedules and recurring automations
dependencies: Build dashboard UI for automation status

tasks.description: Automate attendance checking and reporting from iClassPro

tasks.description: Monitor Canvas for grade updates and assignment postings

tasks.title: Add notification system integration

tasks.title: Add recording editor UI

cross_project_dependencies.description: Depends on shared_services vault for credential management
Integrates with Architect API for task tracking and monitoring

technical_risks: Vault service availability impacts all automation flows
Website structure changes can break flows
resource_risks: Requires active library/iClassPro/Canvas accounts for testing
Browser automation can be resource intensive
mitigation_strategies: Implement graceful fallback when vault is unavailable
Use CSS selectors with fallback strategies
Add health checks before automation execution
